name: roms

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: openmp
variants.description: Turn on shared-memory parallelization in ROMS

variants.name: mpi
variants.description: Turn on distributed-memory parallelization in ROMS

variants.name: roms_application
variants.description: Makefile to include its associated header file

variants.name: debug
variants.description: Turn on symbolic debug information with no optimization

description:
ROMS is a free-surface, terrain-following, primitive equations ocean
model widely used by the scientific community for a diverse range of
applications

dependencies.name: amdlibm
dependencies.description:
AMD LibM is a software library containing a collection of basic math
functions optimized for x86-64 processor-based machines. It provides
many routines from the list of standard C99 math functions. Applications
can link into AMD LibM library and invoke math functions instead of
compiler's math functions for better accuracy and performance. LICENSING
INFORMATION: By downloading, installing and using this software, you
agree to the terms and conditions of the AMD AOCL-FFTW license
agreement. You may obtain a copy of this license agreement from
https://www.amd.com/en/developer/aocl/libm/eula/libm-4-2-eula.html
https://www.amd.com/en/developer/aocl/libm/libm-eula.html

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI. This package has been deprecated. Use intel-oneapi-mpi
instead. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software,
you agree to the terms and conditions of the software license agreements
at https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
